comment.author: 54135313@N05
comment._content: Well there is another image of this that you have posted of the same scene. Comparing the two together, I belive that this one is backwards. That is to say that the brick building (G.OConnell's pier) should be on the right side of the image. Just take the water taxi from Ikea and youll see what I mean.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:

Thanks for your good eye!
